verses.verse: Therefore seeing <WG1223> <WG5124> we have <WG2192> <WG5723> this <WG5026> ministry <WG1248>, as <WG2531> we have received mercy <WG1653> <WG5681>, we faint <WG1573> <WG5719> not <WG3756>;

But <WG235> have renounced <WG550> <WG5639> the hidden things <WG2927> of dishonesty <WG152>, not <WG3361> walking <WG4043> <WG5723> in <WG1722> craftiness <WG3834>, nor <WG3366> handling <WG1389> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316> deceitfully <WG1389> <WG5723>; but <WG235> by manifestation <WG5321> of the truth <WG225> commending <WG4921> <WG5723> ourselves <WG1438> to <WG4314> every <WG3956> man's <WG444> conscience <WG4893> in the sight <WG1799> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1499> our <WG2257> gospel <WG2098> be <WG2076> <WG5748> hid <WG2572> <WG5772>, it is <WG2076> <WG5748> hid <WG2572> <WG5772> to <WG1722> them that are lost <WG622> <WG5730>:

In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> the god <WG2316> of this <WG5127> world <WG165> hath blinded <WG5186> <WG5656> the minds <WG3540> of them which believe not <WG571>, lest <WG1519> <WG3361> the light <WG5462> of the glorious <WG1391> gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the image <WG1504> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, should shine <WG826> <WG5658> unto them <WG846>.

For <WG1063> we preach <WG2784> <WG5719> not <WG3756> ourselves <WG1438>, but <WG235> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> the YY <WG2962>; and <WG1161> ourselves <WG1438> your <WG5216> servants <WG1401> for <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>' sake <WG1223>.

For <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316>, who <WG3588> commanded <WG2036> <WG5631> the light <WG5457> to shine <WG2989> <WG5658> out of <WG1537> darkness <WG4655>, <WG3739> hath shined <WG2989> <WG5656> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588>, to <WG4314> give the light <WG5462> of the knowledge <WG1108> of the glory <WG1391> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> the face <WG4383> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

But <WG1161> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> this <WG5126> treasure <WG2344> in <WG1722> earthen <WG3749> vessels <WG4632>, that <WG2443> the excellency <WG5236> of the power <WG1411> may be <WG5600> <WG5753> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> of <WG1537> us <WG2257>.

We are troubled <WG2346> <WG5746> on <WG1722> every side <WG3956>, yet <WG235> not <WG3756> distressed <WG4729> <WG5746>; we are perplexed <WG639> <WG5734>, but <WG235> not <WG3756> in despair <WG1820> <WG5740>;
Persecuted <WG1377> <WG5746>, but <WG235> not <WG3756> forsaken <WG1459> <WG5746>; cast down <WG2598> <WG5746>, but <WG235> not <WG3756> destroyed <WG622> <WG5730>;

Always <WG3842> bearing about <WG4064> <WG5723> in <WG1722> the body <WG4983> the dying <WG3500> of the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, that <WG2443> the life <WG2222> also <WG2532> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> might be made manifest <WG5319> <WG5686> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> body <WG4983>.

For we <WG2249> which <WG3588> live <WG2198> <WG5723> are <WG3860> alway <WG104> <WG1063> delivered <WG3860> <WG5743> unto <WG1519> death <WG2288> for <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>' sake <WG1223>, that <WG2443> the life <WG2222> also <WG2532> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> might be made manifest <WG5319> <WG5686> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> mortal <WG2349> flesh <WG4561>.
So <WG5620> then <WG3303> death <WG2288> worketh <WG1754> <WG5731> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>, but <WG1161> life <WG2222> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>.

<WG1161> We having <WG2192> <WG5723> the same <WG846> spirit <WG4151> of faith <WG4102>, according as <WG2596> it is written <WG1125> <WG5772>, I believed <WG4100> <WG5656>, and therefore <WG1352> have I spoken <WG2980> <WG5656>; we <WG2249> also <WG2532> believe <WG4100> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> therefore <WG1352> speak <WG2980> <WG5719>;

Knowing <WG1492> <WG5761> that <WG3754> he which raised up <WG1453> <WG5660> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> shall raise up <WG1453> <WG5692> us <WG2248> also <WG2532> by <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, and <WG2532> shall present <WG3936> <WG5692> us with <WG4862> you <WG5213>.

For <WG1063> all things <WG3956> are for <WG1223> your <WG5209> sakes <WG1223>, that <WG2443> the abundant <WG4121> <WG5660> grace <WG5485> might <WG4052> through <WG1223> the thanksgiving <WG2169> of many <WG4119> redound <WG4052> <WG5661> to <WG1519> the glory <WG1391> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For which cause <WG1352> we faint <WG1573> <WG5719> not <WG3756>; but <WG235> though <WG1499> our <WG2257> outward <WG1854> man <WG444> perish <WG1311> <WG5743>, yet <WG235> the inward <WG2081> man is renewed <WG341> <WG5743> day <WG2250> by <WG2532> day <WG2250>.

For <WG1063> our <WG2257> light <WG1645> affliction <WG2347>, which <WG3588> is but for a moment <WG3910>, worketh <WG2716> <WG5736> for us <WG2254> a far <WG2596> <WG5236> more exceeding <WG1519> <WG5236> and eternal <WG166> weight <WG922> of glory <WG1391>;

While <WG4648> we <WG2257> look <WG4648> not <WG3361> at <WG4648> <WG5723> the things which are seen <WG991> <WG5746>, but <WG235> at the things which are <WG991> not <WG3361> seen <WG991> <WG5746>: for <WG1063> the things which are seen <WG991> <WG5746> are temporal <WG4340>; but <WG1161> the things which are <WG991> not <WG3361> seen <WG991> <WG5746> are eternal <WG166>.
